name: part_008
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】『Neverland Paradox』 Ninomae Ina'nis Birthday Live 2023 #INAinaNeverland [yT2ety9RfIo]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_008.mov

scenes.description: Ninomae Ina'nis talks about the songs she just performed and mentions her first original song 'Violet'.

subtitles.original: 皆さん、
subtitles.english: Everyone,

subtitles.original: It's a song I've been fond of for quite a long time actually.
subtitles.english: It's a song I've been fond of for quite a long time actually.

subtitles.original: It's, uh... I think it's lesser known than some of his really, you know, famous songs...
subtitles.english: It's, uh... I think it's lesser known than some of his really, you know, famous songs...

subtitles.original: ...but it has a special place in my heart.
subtitles.english: ...but it has a special place in my heart.

subtitles.original: So I really wanted to sing it for you guys.
subtitles.english: So I really wanted to sing it for you guys.

subtitles.original: And I hope you guys enjoyed it.
subtitles.english: And I hope you guys enjoyed it.

subtitles.original: The song I sang after that is called "こちら、幸福安心委員会です。"
subtitles.english: The song I sang after that is called "This is the Happiness and Peace of Mind Committee."

subtitles.original: I think it's a really fun song that's perfect for a cult.
subtitles.english: I think it's a really fun song that's perfect for a cult.

subtitles.original: Although I wouldn't know anything about being a cult.
subtitles.english: Although I wouldn't know anything about being a cult.

subtitles.original: Definitely not a cult, by the way.
subtitles.english: Definitely not a cult, by the way.

subtitles.original: 幸せですか？ 義務ですよ！
subtitles.english: Are you happy? It's a duty!

subtitles.original: Yeah, and the song after that was "名前のない怪物".
subtitles.english: Yeah, and the song after that was "The Nameless Monster."

subtitles.original: If you guys know, I really love EGOIST...
subtitles.english: If you guys know, I really love EGOIST...

subtitles.original: ...and one of my favorite songs by them is actually this song.
subtitles.english: ...and one of my favorite songs by them is actually this song.

subtitles.original: I've sung it, I think, once or twice in karaoke before...
subtitles.english: I've sung it, I think, once or twice in karaoke before...

subtitles.original: ...but I really wanted to sing it in a live as well, so I hope you guys enjoyed it.
subtitles.english: ...but I really wanted to sing it in a live as well, so I hope you guys enjoyed it.

subtitles.original: The song after that was called "Shall We Dance" by ReoNa.
subtitles.english: The song after that was called "Shall We Dance" by ReoNa.

subtitles.original: A song that you guys actually, a lot of you asked me to sing it after "Nai Nai"...
subtitles.english: A song that you guys actually, a lot of you asked me to sing it after "Nai Nai"...

subtitles.original: ...because it's also from the same series, anime series "Shadow House".
subtitles.english: ...because it's also from the same series, anime series "Shadow House."

subtitles.original: But since, you know, the title itself is "Shall We Dance" and it's a very danceable song...
subtitles.english: But since, you know, the title itself is "Shall We Dance" and it's a very danceable song...

subtitles.original: ...I thought I might as well save it for the live, which I hope you guys enjoyed.
subtitles.english: ...I thought I might as well save it for the live, which I hope you guys enjoyed.

subtitles.original: I think the choreo was a little difficult for me to learn...
subtitles.english: I think the choreo was a little difficult for me to learn...

subtitles.original: ...but I think I pulled it off. Did I, did I do okay?
subtitles.english: ...but I think I pulled it off. Did I, did I do okay?

subtitles.original: Yes, and the song after that is "Violet", my first original song.
subtitles.english: Yes, and the song after that is "Violet", my first original song.

subtitles.original: It's very nostalgic to me every time I listen to it.
subtitles.english: It's very nostalgic to me every time I listen to it.

subtitles.original: And I guess it's been quite a while since I first released it.
subtitles.english: And I guess it's been quite a while since I first released it.

subtitles.original: As it was my first original song, I learned a lot from it...
subtitles.english: As it was my first original song, I learned a lot from it...

subtitles.original: ...and so it's really special to me.
subtitles.english: ...and so it's really special to me.

subtitles.original: But as I've said before, it's been a while since the first original.
subtitles.english: But as I've said before, it's been a while since the first original.

subtitles.original: So maybe it's time for a second one? Sometime soon.
subtitles.english: So maybe it's time for a second one? Sometime soon.

subtitles.original: Soon? Soon.
subtitles.english: Soon? Soon.

subtitles.original: But anyways, thank you everyone for always supporting me.
subtitles.english: But anyways, thank you everyone for always supporting me.

subtitles.original: Thanks everyone who helped in making this live happen.
subtitles.english: Thanks everyone who helped in making this live happen.

subtitles.original: Without you guys, staff-san, everyone, this wouldn't have happened.
subtitles.english: Without you guys, staff-san, everyone, this wouldn't have happened.

subtitles.original: So thank you very, very much.
subtitles.english: So thank you very, very much.

subtitles.original: Yeah, I guess we'll move on to the next song.
subtitles.english: Yeah, I guess we'll move on to the next song.

subtitles.original: I hope you'll enjoy it.
subtitles.english: I hope you'll enjoy it.

subtitles.original:
Meconopsis
Lyrics: WUNDER RIKU Composition・Arrangement: M2U
subtitles.english:
Meconopsis
Lyrics: WUNDER RIKU Composition・Arrangement: M2U

subtitles.original: Sapphire petals fall through infinite white sea
subtitles.english: Sapphire petals fall through infinite white sea

subtitles.original: Misty whispers call, drowning in endless dreams
subtitles.english: Misty whispers call, drowning in endless dreams

subtitles.original: Is this my sanity, clinging for my memory?
subtitles.english: Is this my sanity, clinging for my memory?

subtitles.original: Is this humanity, or long forgotten land?
subtitles.english: Is this humanity, or long forgotten land?

subtitles.original: 壇上の野草が最後のはなびらを落とす
subtitles.english: Wild grass on the stage drops its final petal

subtitles.original: 心はあなたの嘘をすべて暴く
subtitles.english: My heart exposes all of your lies

subtitles.original: Enough! No, I will keep playing endlessly
subtitles.english: Enough! No, I will keep playing endlessly

subtitles.original: A world without love is not the world that I want to see
subtitles.english: A world without love is not the world that I want to see

subtitles.original: If such a man withers, I'll oh yes see
subtitles.english: If such a man withers, I'll oh yes see

subtitles.original: Tell me how do I reconcile the joy in my memory
subtitles.english: Tell me how do I reconcile the joy in my memory

subtitles.original: 今だ身を落とす最後のチャンス
subtitles.english: Now is the last chance to throw myself down

subtitles.original: 血の誓い 藍の誓い
subtitles.english: A blood oath, an indigo oath

subtitles.original: Together we may die, love is now and forever
subtitles.english: Together we may die, love is now and forever

subtitles.original: 孤独に割れぬ愛を...
subtitles.english: A love that cannot be broken in solitude...

subtitles.original: When the silver diamond oceans alight, eternity sapphire petals fall through
subtitles.english: When the silver diamond oceans alight, eternity sapphire petals fall through

subtitles.english: Wild grass on the stage drops its final petal

subtitles.english: My heart exposes all of your lies

subtitles.original: Enough! No, I will keep playing endlessly
subtitles.english: Enough! No, I will keep playing endlessly

subtitles.english: A world without love is not the world that I want to see
